channel.title: Summoning
channel.description: anyone have a code to make it so you cant attack your summoned monster?

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

well I have this and I have been trying to figure out how to code it something like this I just don’t know how to make it so the owner that spawned the npc cant attack there npc…its getting annoying trying to figure it out

		if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].spawnedBy != c.playerId && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].spawnedBy > 0) {
			resetPlayerAttack();
			c.sendMessage("This monster was not spawned for you.");
			return;
		}

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

In your attacking block do something like

if (target instanceof Npc && NpcUtils.isSummonedNpc(target.getId()) && target.getOwner().equals(YOU)) { return; }
